system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. During the construction of our new galleries, the Museum building will only be open during [education](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/education/) and [auditorium/courtyard](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/events-performances/) program hours. We will not have general open hours until the gallery expansion is complete in Fall 2026.
Explore the [Winter 2026 Program Catalog](https://www.scribd.com/document/968127453/Longmont-Museum-Winter-2026-Program-Catalog) to learn about upcoming events.

The Longmont Museum galleries are now closed for construction until Fall 2026 as we work toward our exciting [expansion](http://www.supportlongmontmuseum.org).
Even though we will not have exhibits during this time, **Museum[education programs](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/education/) and [auditorium ](https://longmontcol"}

state_record_subset.notes: CSV: phone from IRS 990 database CSV: museum type 'GENERAL MUSEUM' CSV: coordinates from IRS 990 database

evidence_packet.website_text_snippet:
# Longmont Museum
During the construction of our new galleries, the Museum building will only be open during [education](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/education/) and [auditorium/courtyard](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/events-performances/) program hours. We will not have general open hours until the gallery expansion is complete in Fall 2026.
Explore the [Winter 2026 Program Catalog](https://www.scribd.com/document/968127453/Longmont-Museum-Winter-2026-Program-Catalog) to learn about upcoming events.
Exhibits Closed for Expansion, Programs Continue 
The Longmont Museum galleries are now closed for construction until Fall 2026 as we work toward our exciting [expansion](http://www.supportlongmontmuseum.org).
Even though we will not have exhibits during this time, **Museum[education programs](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/education/) and [auditorium ](https://longmontcolorado.gov/museum/events-performances/)events will continue!**
## **Explore the Longmont Museum**
Discover everything the Longmont Museum has to offer, from world-class exhibitions to engaging events and programs. 
[ Event Calendar ](https://longmontcolorado.gov/events/category/museum/)
